dt: {bc}the point or area at which something divides into two branches or parts {bc}the point at which {d_link|bifurcating|bifurcate} occurs

dt.t: Inflammation may occlude the {wi}bifurcation{/wi} of the trachea.

dt: {bc}the state of being divided into two branches or parts {bc}the act of {a_link|bifurcating}

shortdef: the point or area at which something divides into two branches or parts : the point at which bifurcating occurs
the state of being divided into two branches or parts : the act of bifurcating
